It's a good game, and I like it a lot. There people still playing it, so that's good! And, it's challenging too. One thing I disliked about this game is the clipping in it. Other than that, it's really good, and it looks really nice, instead of that blocking-looking character models in the original, even though the original was a good-looking game, this improved upon it, in beauty. It's one of the best WW2 underrated shooters out there, and you'll like it a lot. It's a great game.

教大家怎么样才能打开游戏（话说制作组不解决一下吗？毕竟游戏都进不去啊)  先打开游戏目录 点开里面的HL2 然后会自动报错，点确定就行了 接着从Steam启动游戏即可。
It's a great game for low end computers and is fun :P

Lo definiria como uno de los juegos mas visiosos y nostalgicos, usando el motor de half life 2 se ve muy bien para la epoca en que salio, hay mapas diferentes y muy bien diseñados mas aparte una cantidad considerable de modos de juegos, lo malo actualmente es que hay muy poca gente jugandolo y cuesta encontrar una partida con un buen pin y que no tenga bots pero aun asi considero que es un juego muy iconico, las armas son simples y algunas son complicadas de usar y si requiere practica. Ten en cuenta que todas las armas tienen retroceso eso en mi opinion le da un poco de realismo pero hay gente que talvez no se sienta comodo con eso pero si has jugado otros titulos de valve de este estilo como csgo debes probarlo.

En conclucion... es muy divertido jugarlo pero si cuesta encontrar una partida algunas veces y lo mejor de todo es que si no tienes una gran PC puede correrlo sin problemas, aunque si hay algunos errores aveces. Ten en cuenta hace cuanto tiempo salio y actualmente sigue siendo entretenido.
The most fun you'll ever have with recoil.

这游戏里高手很多，很强。武器需要很长时间去掌握。步枪很强，K98基本一（或两）枪一个，加兰德则需要两枪；冲锋枪和自动步枪则需要蹲下压枪；狙击枪很好使，但不像CS系列，DODs的镜头是会动的；机枪最简单，趴下当老阴逼；火箭筒也很强，就是要考虑下坠问题。
There are lots of masters in this game, they are powerful. It will take you much time to master the weapons. The rifles are powerful, K98 can kill someone by one or two bullets, while Garand needs two;  the submachine guns and automatic rifles need players to control the recoil; the sniper rifles are easy to use, but the scope will shake, which is different from CS; the machine guns are easiest, you only have to prone and be a "camper"; the anti-tank rockets are also powerful, but don't ignore the dropping of rockets.

Unfortunately poor compared to other games of the genre

There are a few active multiplayer servers, but finding a server in Europe or NA isn't a problem. The problems in this game come in the mechanics. Whereas other source shooters have nearly impeccable shooting mechanics (like CS:GO and TF2), DoD has an engine and mechanics that encourage camping and are not nearly as responsive or polished. Recoil is far too high for some weapons, and others are far too punishing. the bullet spread on weapons like the k98, plus the fact that the weapon has a 1.5 second cooldown makes it difficult to recover from bad RNG. The best way to explain this games problems is to compare it to CS:GO, another valve shooter on the same engine. While DoDS has spread mechanics and different weapon types as well as near instant death, CS:GO's execution is nearly flawless while DoDS lacks polish. 

While great at the time, the game lacks polish by todays standards and there are clearly better games on the market.

4/10
